name: Verify Number of Entries displayed for Leave Tab

testSteps.description: 1: Verify Number of Entries displayed for Leave Tab ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=View Request Status, dateRange=01 Apr 2021 - 31 Mar 2022, noOfRecords=25})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "View Request Status" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
Then Verify Date Range field is present
Then Verify Date Range field is present
Then Enter "01 Apr 2021 - 31 Mar 2022" Valid Date range for Leave Tab
And Verify "01 Apr 2021 - 31 Mar 2022" text displays
Then Verify "01 Apr 2021 - 31 Mar 2022" is selected
And Verify number of records displayed by default
Then Select "25" as Number of entries for "Leave History" tab
And Verify number of records displayed changes

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "<childTab>" sub tab of "<parentTab>" tab
And Verify "<defaultTab>" displays by default
Then Verify Date Range field is present
Then Verify Date Range field is present
And Click "Date Range" dropdown
Then Enter "<dateRange>" Valid Date range for Leave Tab
And Verify "<dateRange>" text displays
Then Verify "<dateRange>" is selected
And Verify number of records displayed by default
Then Select "<noOfRecords>" as Number of entries for "Leave History" tab
And Verify number of records displayed changes
